html:
Name

The step name, for example, "Prepaid" or "Full delivery."

Type

"Delivery" or "Payment."

Status

The step status. "Completed" or "Uncompleted."

Percentage, %

The expected delivery or payment amount in percentage.

Invoice

Select or add an invoice connected to the current step of the installment plan.

Products

Specify products to pay or deliver during this step.
